#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>

#define int64 long long int
using namespace std;
inline int nextInt()
{
	char c;
	int64 n = 0;
	
	while((c = getchar())<48);
	n += (c-'0');
	
	while((c = getchar()) >= 48)
		n = n * 10 + (c-'0');
		
	return n;
}
int main()
{
	
	//ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	
	int64 T; T = nextInt();
	
	while(T--)
	{
		int64 N; N = nextInt();
		
		if(N == 1)
			N = (N-1);
		
		printf("%lld\n",(N == 0 ? N : (N%2 == 0 ? ((N*(N/2)))-1 : ((N/2)*(N+1)-1))));
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}//end main
